overview: In some traditional Indian families, daughters-in-law are blamed for luring sons away from home. This filmed play tells the story of a daughter-in-law who bucks tradition by helping to maintain a loving bond between her husband and his father. The heartwarming Gujurati movie, directed by Amit Divetia, stars Ami Trivedi, Haresh Panchal, Dilip Rawal, Anuradham and Leena Shah.
title: Mota Ghar Ni Vahu
